Rating_Title: Mahindra Alturas G4 Is The Most Comfortable Car
Reviews_Description: Mahindra Alturas G4 is the most comfortable and safest car. Its features, interior, and mileage are very good. Overall very good car.
Overall performance is great and features at this price point. The best safest car in this segment.
This is the most comfortable car and looks attractive. The exterior is great and the price is also very reasonable according to the features. It has good mileage, this is a value for money.

Rating_Title: Fall In Love With Alturas G4
Reviews_Description: Fabulous car. Better than MG Gloster and Ford endeavours. And on par with Fortuner in terms of safety and comfort. Simply, I am falling in love with Alturas G4.
This car is so good and great. It is a stylish car and the car is like BMW and Benz.

Rating_Title: Real SUV With Comfort Of A Sedan
Reviews_Description: Luxury on wheels, silent engine, high performance, premium interiors, huge size, elegant looks, sunroof, etc.
This car is a beast. No one can beat it. Mahindra Alturas G4 is not trash.
Very good Car in Saftey. Very good car in looking. Very good car in features. Very Nice car in all.
Best car in this segment. Don't discontinue it. Launch a new facelift version.
It goes beyond expectation and it seems the company made for the competition in the luxury car segment in cheap.

I heard that in the coming days there would be a problem with the servicing of Mahindra Alturas, as Mahindra is not importing any more spare parts as there has been a split between Mahindra and Korean company Ssangyong recently. If a company intends to discontinue its flagship SUV than it wud be stupidity for the company to assemble the remaining 5...

Overall great build quality. Looking forward to buying this car. Capable off-roader. Everything has its pros and cons but in my aspect it is still the best in the segment in terms of comfort, driving pleasure, safety, etc.
Very good machine from Ssangyong. Maintenance is very low. High-standard car for Mahindra's family. I'm happy to buy this.
It would be better if Mahindra looks into this 3rd-row seating. If they correct it by more specious that would be awesome.
It is far better than its rivals and I am satisfied with Mahindra. Alturas is a very good product of Mahindra. Thanks, Mahindra to make our enjoyable rides.

This is far better than Fortuner and Endeavour. But as it's an Indian product, Indians think it's not cool. Hence, low sales. Fortuner is still competition, but I think the new Endeavour is weak in front of this.

Rating_Title: Best Car In The Segment- Alturas G4
Reviews_Description: In my opinion, Alturas G4 is a perfect SUV of Mahindra with amazing looks inside and outside. It's so easy and smooth in driving and gives me a safest and comfortable drive as it comes with well-Ventilated seats, sunroof, dual-zone AC, and a lot of extra features. The service cost of this car is bearable and it's easy to find out a Mahindra service...

Rating_Title: Alturas G4 - Luxurious SUV Of Mahindra
Reviews_Description: The luxurious SUV Mahindra Alturas G4 looks so amazing and bigger than any other SUV in this price range. Newly designed tail light looking very impressive and Interior of the car is so luxurious. Build Quality of this car is awesome and handling is just good even if I am driving it on high speed or any bad roads. Seating posture is much comfortabl...

Alturas G4 is a costly SUV from Mahindra but it delivers much better mileage than its competitor and it has a very comfortable and spacious cabin which is perfect to go for a long journey. The addition of a panoramic sunroof and ventilated seats made this car my first choice to have for me and my family.
All feature is good, Mahindra Alturas G4 is better than Toyota Fortuner and Ford Endeavour.price is also low.
This is a very powerful car than Fortuner and endeavor it is very comfortable best in segment features.

Mahindra Alturas G4 is an awesome car with advanced features and happy to drive. Best ever car of Mahindra group.Thanks to Mahindra groups.
The comfort and the drive if the car is superb along with the car offer great looks and design.
The car is amazingly packed with technology is unbelievable competition in the segment.

I truly love this car and now I m feeling like this is what I have always wanted a perfect car with all fea...

Best in class in features like comfort, style, space, engine etc, no more words for an SUV like this from Mahindra. It's a rough & tough SUV for all weathers, you can find around you and it's a more impressive feature, in my opinion.

Mahindra Alturas is worth for the costing. Third-row seating is only suitable for kids. Infotainment needs to be improved, the off-road performance is also good. Overall vehicle is very muscular and bold in class
